content: you can just crochet enough of an i-cord for single height folding in half fold in half and sew the edges together this is demonstrated in the youtube video attaching to the pumpkin i thread the long tail in at the top of the pumpkin catching a couple of stitches then thread the short cast-on tail in at different place at the top of the pumpkin catching a couple of stitches now tie these two tails together using three or four knots cut the tails still leaving length but so they are both the same length thread onto tapestry needle and push into pumpkin to hide the ends cut the excess thread your pumpkin is finished display gift or sell and enjoy 3 pattern support instagram @angelamakesni facebook @facebook com/angelamakesni youtube angela makes - shorturl at/pqufn e-mail angelamakes@outlook com website ravelry ravelry com/angelamakesni please tag me in your makes #angelamakesni #amnipumpkin copyright © 2022 angela allen all rights reserved by downloading this pattern you agree to use it for your own use items made from it can be gifted or sold you may not share this pattern electronically or in print but you can share the ravelry link 4
